name: LujoEmotes
description: A Premium Minecraft plugin that transforms player interactions by offering custom emotes for deaths and assassinations.

features.name: PlaceholderAPI Integration
features.description: Allows to obtain with placeholder api all the information of the emotes of players.

features.name: Easy Files config
features.description: The configuration files are easy to use.

features.name: Fully customizable
features.description: You can create your own animations.

features.name: All language support
features.description: Translate it to the language of your choice.

features.name: MythicMobs
features.description: You can summon things that are not animations, if you want to use it for another purpose when you die, for example a minion.

features.name: ModelEngine
features.description: You can invoke entities/animations with custom 3d models with ModelEngine.

name: BasePlugin
description: BasePlugin is a comprehensive Minecraft development solution, providing tools and APIs for custom plugin creation. This project streamlines plugin development, enabling creators to focus on innovation.

features.name: All in one
features.description: Allows development for both Spigot and BungeeCord within the same project

features.name: Modular
features.description: Enables generation of JAR files with only the essentials

name: BlockCounter
description: It is a placeholderExtension which gives us the information of a block with its placeholder.

features.name: Simple
features.description: Simple and minimalist use and installation
